clinical_study.brief_title: Interest of Tumor Replicates in Avian Embryo to Model Therapeutic Effects of BRAFi/MEKi in BRAF Mutated Melanoma
clinical_study.official_title: Interest of Tumor Replicates in Avian Embryo to Model Therapeutic Effects of BRAF Inhibitors/MEK Inhibitors (BRAFi/MEKi) in BRAF Mutated Melanoma

brief_summary.textblock: This is an interventional mono-centric study in patients with BRAF mutated metastatic melanoma treated with BRAF/MEK inhibitors. The aim of the study is to test the grafting of patient tumoral cells in avian embryo and develop a predictive in vivo model for patient treatment response.

primary_outcome.description: Number of grafted embryo which develop tumor measurable by 3D microscopy

secondary_outcome.measure: BRAFi/MEKi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryo
secondary_outcome.description: Survival rate in avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: BRAFi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryon
secondary_outcome.description: Survival rate in avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: MEKi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryo
secondary_outcome.description: weight of avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.description: Height of avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: MEKi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryo
secondary_outcome.description: Height of avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: BRAFi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryo
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of cardiac malformation in avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: MEKi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryo
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of cardiac malformation in avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: BRAFi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryo
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of craniofacial malformation in avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations

secondary_outcome.measure: MEKi maximum toxic effect dose in avian embryo
secondary_outcome.description: Presence of craniofacial malformation in avian embryo after treatment injections in different concentrations
Embryo tumor volume obtained by confocal microscopy before treatment administration compared with tumor volume of non-treated embryo

intervention.description: 5mm skin metastasis or primary melanoma biopsy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients aged ≥ 18 years
- Signed written informed consent
- Patient with BRAF V600 mutated metastatic or unresectable melanoma histologically confirmed
- BRAFi/MEKi treatment indication
- Patient with skin tumor (excluded face and skinfold) available for biopsy
- Measurable disease as defined by RECIST v1.1 criteria
- Patient affiliated to or a beneficiary of a social security category
Exclusion Criteria:
- Ocular melanoma
- Medical, psychiatric, cognitive or other conditions that may compromise the patient's ability to understand the patient information, give informed consent, comply with the study protocol or complete the study
- Pregnant or nursing (lactating) women
- Patients protected by law

facility.name: Service de Dermatologie, Centre hospitalier Lyon Sud, HCL
